showScoreExcerpt:
“Despite the potential for cliches, Bioh creates multi-dimensional characters in believable situations. The dialogue sizzles and the fiery cast studiously avoids stereotypes in their lively limning...Jaja’s shop may be a familiar one, but it’s a snappy, joyful place to spend an hour and a half.”
